results.summary: The agent report closely matches the human expert report with minor discrepancies, particularly the inclusion of PowerHal and omission of specific elements like SW_REQ2.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM (CPU Manager) as a root cause and ruled out MMDVFS, but included PowerHal which was not mentioned in the gold standard.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal chain but added PowerHal and did not specify SW_REQ2.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported the key metrics, including VCORE and DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS, but the inclusion of PowerHal was unnecessary.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were relevant but could have been more directly aligned with the gold standard.

results.summary: The agent report closely matches the human expert report with minor omissions in metric precision and actionability. Overall, it provides a comprehensive analysis with logical reasoning.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain from CM/PowerHal to DDR and VCORE was well captured, including SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified key metrics but missed some specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The report provided relevant historical fixes but could have included more specific recommendations.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and metrics with logical reasoning. Minor improvements could be made in causal chain completeness and actionability details.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to CM, PowerHal, and MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified most metrics, including VCORE and DDR percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could be more detailed.
